descriptions.direction: Located in Medhufaru, Soneva Jani is on the beach. While the natural beauty of Kuredu Beach and Hurawalhi Beach can be enjoyed by anyone, those looking for an activity can check out Orimasvaru Island Pier. Scuba diving, windsurfing, and swimming offer great chances to get out on the surrounding water, or you can seek out an adventure with hiking/biking trails nearby.
descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Soneva Jani is around 43 km from Malé. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The one-storey beach hotel has 26 rooms in total. It offers its guests a 24h reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee) and cinema. For the meals, there are 4 restaurants. In a total 3 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service and medical service are free of charge. For the laundry service and concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find a children´s pool. Meals: ?? Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. A golf course is in the vicinity of the hotel. Spa area, sauna and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Child supervision: mini club for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English. Accepted methods of payment: American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice. 1 Bedroom Residence FamilyRoom (Island View, Domestic Flight): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 1 Bedroom Residence FamilyRoom (Island View, Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Crusoe Retreat (With Slide - Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Crusoe Retreat (Domestic Flight): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 1 Bedroom Water Retreat (Shared Pool): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 1 Bedroom Water Retreat (With Slide - Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 1 Bedroom Water Retreat (Domestic Flight): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 1 Bedroom Water Retreat (Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Water Retreat (Shared Pool): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Water Retreat (With Slide - Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Water Retreat (Domestic Flight): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Water Retreat (Seaplane): With extra bed, balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and sat TV as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. TRANSFER OPTIONS MANDATORY FOR ALL THE GUESTS. SEAPLANE TRANSFER flying hours are restricted to daylight hours from 06:30 to 16:00 hrs only. Approx 35-40 minutes away from Male Airport. The standard permissible weight is 25 kg, which includes 20 kg of checked-in luggage and 5 kg of hand luggage per person. Guests arriving after 16:00 have an option to book Domestic or overnight accommodation (own expense) in close by hotel and will be transferred to resort the following day. ERRATA: Customer Information - Comment:Maldives Seaplane operates during daylight between 6:00hrs to 15:30hrs All intl. Arrival flights land after 15:00hrs & departure before 09:00hrs. Guests have to overnight in Male, Hulhumale or airport hotel and take flight on the next day. Rooms - Action:at annex; Comment:Any rooms available with more than 2 pax. Only 1 extra bed or Rollaway bed or sofa bed will be provided. No Rooms can accommodate more than 1 extra bed.
